messages.content: Uh, yes, this is Kirby Nicol, the mayor of Capitola. I'm calling for assistance.
Okay, where is this assistance needed, sir?
I'd like to have an officer come to 4850 Emerald Street.
We've got a person here who is not fit to drive and needs to be taken back home.
Okay, so I just need to clarify, is the address 4850 Emerald Street?
Alright. We'll send someone over. No lights and no sirens. And who's the person that needs assistance?
My name is Kirby Nicol. I'm the Mayor of Capitola.
No, I mean the person that is intoxicated.
The person that is ill is Jim Harris.
Okay. We will send someone to the address to assess the situation. Thank you.
